dcterms:creator: Jenifer Whitten-Woodring
Douglas A. Van Belle
dcterms:description: The Global Media Freedom Dataset provides a comprehensive overview of media freedom across 196 countries from 1948 to 2010, categorizing them based on their media freedom status, including classifications such as 'Not Free Media' and 'Imperfectly Free/Free Media'.
dcterms:title: Global Media Freedom Dataset (GMFD)
